``` 
intros net Hreach. unfold lifted_entries_contiguous_nw. intros p t n pli plt es ci Hin Hp.
apply Hreach in Hin. unfold msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable in Hin.
destruct Hin as [Hinit | Hfail | Hhandle].
- destruct Hinit. discriminate.
- destruct Hfail as [failed net' failed' out Hmrr Hsf].
  intros Hcont. apply (Hcont p t n pli plt es ci).
  + assumption.
  + apply Hsf.
- destruct Hhandle as [net h inp gd out]. intros Hn NATO Hgd Hl. apply (Hl p t n pli plt es ci).
  + assumption.
  + reflexivity.
```

original: intros net Hreach. unfold lifted_entries_contiguous_nw. intros p t n pli plt es ci Hin Hp. apply Hreach in Hin. unfold msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable in Hin. destruct Hin as [Hinit | Hfail | Hhandle]. - destruct Hinit. discriminate. - destruct Hfail as [failed net' failed' out Hmrr Hsf]. intros Hcont. apply (Hcont p t n pli plt es ci). + auto. + apply Hsf. - destruct Hhandle as [net h inp gd out]. intros Hn NATO Hgd Hl. apply (Hl p t n pli plt es ci). + auto. + reflexivity.
